EmailTemplate.subject: BDM Prospect Letter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Lesley Busch
Business Development Manager
Office Depot - Business Solutions Division
412-860-6175
lesley.busch@officedepot.com
The future of supply procurement is here! At Office Depot we have discovered what it takes to successfully create the strongest partnerships... Listen to what you want, achieve your goals and never stop innovating! Think about it, can you say that you feel like your current supplier puts you first? With Office Depot you'll never have doubt!
Check us out...
Â·Lowest Pricing Strategies:
100's of Preset GPO Partnership Programs Available Custom Pricing Programs to meet your specific price objectives Web-Less vs. List-Less to provide a lower pricing model and more transparency.
World Class Website:
Intuitive and easy to use search engine Highest discount items are always easiest to find Real-time dashboard to monitor usage and spend trends Smart Cart feature to steer purchasing toward lowest priced items Custom eCommerce designed to handle multiple shipping locations, users, and approval chains. Online Bill Management for easier invoice reconciliation.
Single Vendor Solution:
IT Products & Services Furniture Janitorial & Cleaning Supplies Breakroom Print Marketing & Branding Managed Print Services
Now is a great time to review your current program.
I will contact you in the next week to schedule a convenient time to meet.
